title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Beat the eggs and mix with cheese and pepper.
Drain pasta and add to pancetta. Mix well.
Remove from heat and add the egg mixture. Stir until creamy.
Serve with extra cheese and pepper.
